ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was supported by the Nuclear Process Science Initiative (NPSI) at Pacific Northwest National Laboratory (PNNL). PNNL is a multi-program national laboratory operated for the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) by Battelle Memorial Institute under Contract No. DE-AC05-76RL0-1830. Computational resources were provided by PNNL Institutional Computing (PIC).
